dashboard.subtitle: Zunery Nexus
dashboard.title: Your AI Team
dashboard.description: Pick an agent or let the orchestrator route your prompt automatically.
dashboard.inputPlaceholder: Ask anything — the orchestrator routes to the right agent…
dashboard.inputHint: Press Enter to send · Shift+Enter for new line

chat.noAgentDesc: Create an agent first to start chatting. Agents use your configured LLM to respond.
chat.emptyDesc: Start a conversation or select one from the sidebar.
chat.inputPlaceholder: Message {{name}}… (Enter to send, Shift+Enter for new line)

agents.title: Agents
agents.noAgentsDesc: Create an agent to start chatting. Each agent can have its own model, system prompt, and configuration.
agents.name: Name
agents.systemPromptLocked: System prompt is read-only for built-in agents.
agents.toolsHint: Agent decides when to use them
agents.deleteConfirm: Delete this agent? All conversations will also be deleted.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure your LLM providers and preferences.

tools.webSearchDesc: Search Google for current information, news, and facts
